definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) Act of waiting ; delay. [Attested from (1150 to 1350) to the early 17 century.]
( dated or law ) Stay or continuance in a place; sojourn . [Attested from (1350 to 1470) to the mid 18 century.]
( formal ) A residence, dwelling or habitation . [First attested from around 1350 to 1470.]

main_definition: ( obsolete ) Act of waiting ; delay. [Attested from (1150 to 1350) to the early 17 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( dated or law ) Stay or continuance in a place; sojourn . [Attested from (1350 to 1470) to the mid 18 century.]
( formal ) A residence, dwelling or habitation . [First attested from around 1350 to 1470.]

definitions.dating_raw: Attested from the late 16 century to the late 17 century.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) An omen ; a foretelling . [Attested from the late 16 century to the late 17 century.]
